parameters.query:
SELECT 
  id,
  wa_id,
  context_data,
  created_at,
  updated_at
FROM user_contexts 
WHERE wa_id = '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.wa_id }}'
LIMIT 1;

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO user_contexts (wa_id, context_data, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
  '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.wa_id }}',
  jsonb_build_object(
    'status', 'mail_contact',
    'statusBot', 'waiting_response',
    'nombre', '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.nombre }}',
    'telefono', '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.telefono }}',
    'correo', '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.correo }}',
    'aviso', '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.aviso }}',
    'tipo', '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.tipo }}',
    'mail_sent_at', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    'ultima_interaccion', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    'interacciones', jsonb_build_array(
      jsonb_build_object(
        'timestamp', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
        'actor', 'sistema',
        'canal', 'email_to_whatsapp',
        'tipo', 'contacto_email_inmuebles24',
        'mensaje', 'Contacto recibido v√≠a email de Inmuebles24',
        'detalles', jsonb_build_object(
          'aviso', '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.aviso }}',
          'tipo', '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.tipo }}',
          'correo', '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.correo }}',
          'mensaje_enviado', '{{ $('Message a model').item.json.message.content }}'
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
RETURNING *;

UPDATE user_contexts
SET 
  context_data = jsonb_set(
    context_data,
    '{api_contact_id}',
    to_jsonb({{ $('Create API Contact').item.json.data.id }}::integer)
  ),
  updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE wa_id = '{{ $('Extract: data').item.json.wa_id }}'
RETURNING *;
